Достоинства: Увлекательный сюжет великолепная графика Отличный геймплей.
Недостатки: просто быть не может!
Как и ожидалось - продолжение саги о путешествиях физика - теоретика Гордона Фримена будет иметь довольно продолжительный, оригинальный и ни с чем не сравнимое продолжение. Как обычно, нашему любимому главному герою предстоит спасти ситуацию из полного краха, и при этом выжить. 
как обычно, с монтировкой в руках Гордон борется с различной нечистью - зомби и комбайнами и при этом старается спасти людей, подвергающихся полному геноциду со стороны Альянса - инопланетной организации, держащей под контролем данную территорию. 
Продолжительный и увлекательный сюжет, содержащий в себе юмор, перестрелки и множество оружия и кровопролития не оставит никого равнодушным. 
Увлекательный и фантастичный сюжет Half Life не оставит равнодушным никого.

[b]Half-Life 2 is an amazing game.[/b]

[b]Half-Life 2's level design is really good[/b] and does a good job at letting you be in a confined space but not letting you feel trapped. It feels authentic in a sense that, if you're in a specific level, you're trapped by actual walls or solid and visible objects; as opposed to invisible objects. Some would think that it might have invisible walls with a futuristic touch, like blue lines going through it, since it is a Sci-Fi game.

[b]Half-Life 2 also does an excellent job and making you feel scared.[/b] There is one level, Ravenholm, it is absolutely filled with zombies, it is a very dark and eerie level. I remember, the entire time I was playing through it, I was extremely terrified, but had to power through. It was hard.

[b]Half-Life 2's combat is pretty spot on[/b], almost no errors anywhere with hitboxes being fine and no noticeable or game-breaking bugs. The game also has a variety of weapons.

[b]Half-Life 2 lets you drive[/b] 2 vehicles in the game, one of which is a Jeep, it is a very fast land-vehicle. It is mildly difficult to control while at high speeds, which isn't a bad thing, it's to be expected. The Airboat is a fast land and water vehicle which is noticeably difficult to control, at almost any time. The game has a good sue of vehicles in specific levels.

[b]Half-Life 2's soundtrack and sounds do sound very modern[/b]. The soundtrack is extremely good, and chooses what to play at specific times, but even so, the music it does actually play is very good. Even now, while writing this review, I am listening to part of the soundtrack, Triage at Dawn, it is called. A very, very nice part of the soundtrack. The sounds, even crowbarring a toilet or a wall, do sound very real.

[b]The game, I should talk about, doesn't, for me, at least, do an excellent job at keeping you hooked[/b], it took me a while in between play-sessions to get back into it. But I very recently finished it.

[b]This all makes out to be a very pleasant gaming experience, and it is highly recommended as a game.
91/100[/b]

Even with Valves name on it, this game is average. The MAIN characters are unique and are easily memorable. However, everyone else is not. This game deserves the money.  It, to this day, doesn't look all that bad, and the way physics are integrated into the gameplay was something revolutionary for it's time, and still such a brilliant game.  Moving story (That we still need more of -_-), good gameplay, which only gets better and better the further you get into the series.  If you are gonna buy this, PLEASE SPEND THE MONEY on the HL collection, which gives you all of the HL games.  HL has a lot to do with it's deep narrative, and you can't get the full experience without playing them all.  Not that the games aren't good on their own, but damn, it is so beautiful if you appreciate writing.

Few shooters nowadays will have this level of interactivity, this level of innovation that valve introduced.

Half-Life 2 mag mal eine Referenz gewesen sein, aber seitdem ist schon reichlich Zeit vergangen. Das Spiel ist im Vergleich zu heutigen Spitzenprodukten einfach nur schlecht. Damit meine ich nicht nur die Grafik und die Soundeffekte. Auch Präsentation und Dramatik sind einfach nicht mehr zeitgemäß.

Die hohe Bewertung ist ein Relikt und der Nostalgie etlicher Fans zuzuschreiben. Euch erwartet hier kein beeindruckendes Spielerlebnis mehr. Ihr werdet eher überrascht sein, was mal als ungöaublich toll angesehen wurde. 

Nochmal für alle: Vor 10 Jahren war es ein wegweisendes Spiel, aber heute kann ich den Kauf (außer für Nostalgiker) nicht empfehlen.

Nachtrag: Ich hab mich nochmal zusammengerissen und es probiert, aber es reißt mich einfach nicht mit. Von der schrecklichen deutschen Synchro fingen mir sogar noch zusätzlich die Ohren an zu bluten. Half-Life 2 ist im Vergleich zu heutigen Shooter echt schlecht.

Man, I just made enemies of everyone on Steam.  Half-Life 2 is a sorely over-rated game.  It is visually striking and the engine fantastic, but the gameplay itself was disappointing.  The plot is weaker than the original game, the gameplay was less engaging than the original and the vehicle sections, my God, I nearly gave up playing during those!  If you want to play Gordon Freeman, play the original Half-Life: it is still an amazing game, and beats the pants of the sequel.

It's a classic and holds its own today surpisingly. It is known by just about every gamer and a must buy if you dont have it. Buy the game, don't be "that guy", no body likes that guy. Buy it, play it, beat it, feel like a god. If you buy this game you can breath fire and own an army of llamas. If you buy this game you can create blizzards in your backyard, you can visit alternate dementions, you dont just feel like a god, you are god. (ok, on a serious note, this game was essentially the game that raised the gaming industry into what it is today and although it may seem low end now, it was once the most revolutionary game outhere. this is just one of those games that everybody has (or atleast the older of us) and just one of those games that an incredible amount of people recommend, including me, other than that it's kinda average if not low quality by todays standerds).

Why is Half Life series seen as one of if not THE best game series ever made? It is because this game (when it was released) showed intense action, exploration, ingenuity, and brilliance in design. All wrapped up in a well optimized and beautiful game environment. Half Life 2 is a linear FPS that makes a closed and narrow world feel open. The environment and ambience is absolutely jaw dropping, especially since this game is about 9 years old. Half Life 2 is that perfect mix of storytelling and action that makes you feel statisfied while leaving you on the edge of your seat begging for a final chapter. In terms of structre, the game is incredibly simplistic. A lost of shooting with some puzzles and the occasional bit of dialogue to break up the setting. This game is a king among the peasant shooters of the modern era. Although it's age is beginning to show, it still holds the throne strong. I am yet to play a game as fun and fufilling and rich with story as Half Life 2.

One of the best story lines in a game I have ever experienced. Full of action, puzzles and strategy, all of which are fun. I loved every part of this game, and considering when this was made, I find it amazing that it remains so high quality. I really suggest that anyone reading this plays it. It's a fun, exciting and scary game, that apparently never gets old. Good job, Valve.

This game....where do I start? This game is just so good. Yes the gun mechanics and graphics might not be the absolute best. This game is the PERFECT example that graphics don't make a game.

The storyline is a perfect 10/10: You'll definitly feel attached to Gordon and Alyx at the end of the game. This game will make you feel like oh my god this is just amazing.

The gun mechanics are 6/10: There phenominal for a game made in 2004 but they dont compare to what you have now. So if you expect a game with perfect guns turn around.

The graphics are 7.5/10: Once again phenominal for a game made in 2004. If you have played Garry's mod and like the graphics go ahead and buy this game.

Overall 9/10: Why are you reading this review...Go ahead scroll up click the "Add to Cart" button and proceed...Trust me it's worth it.

This game is amazing, and the Source engine has aged well. Half Life 2 is visually pleasing and holds up to most AAA realeases today. Having updated to a more recent version of the Source engine, since Half Life 2's release back in 2004, the game feels more refined and responsive. From controls to the environment and everything in between.

The Story, whilst not being a masterpeice, is top notch. It doesn't require any knowledge from Half Life, so if you're new to the franchise your not questioning back story.

Gordon's travels take you across multiple environments requiring different tactics and gorgeous aesthetics.

10/10

Great game. Cool physics and weapons that were fun and different to play with. The "bossfights" were awesome, even though I played through half of the game without really knowing how I was supposed to defeat them :b. It wasn't until my brother played it I got to know how I was supposed to use the rocket launcher. Kept killing myself with it :b.
   The game has an interesting story, cool vehicles, awesome ways of getting around and the giganitc robots :O. Ahh, such a joy to defeat them. The different places we visit through the game are so different, and the parkour - if I can call it that - is actually a lot of fun. You get allies through the game too. The enemies have different abilities they use to kill you too.
   It really does something no other game does right. The gameplay, story, the look. So much awesomeness. 

9.5/10

Só adianto: O MISTÉRIO AINDA NÃO ACABOU

-spoiler alert-

Half Life 2 supera o antigo half life na questão história.
O jogo é maior em tempo de jogo que o primeiro (pra não falar GIGANTE).
A história deixa um pouco o modo creepy do antigo half-life de lado para da ar á uma revolução (que ficou legal).
Existe um levante popular dentro do jogo e cada vez ele fica maior.
O homem misterioso do final do half-life 1 volta já de cara no começo do jogo acordando o personagem , do que seria um transi existencial (que aconteceu no final do half-life 1), e você acorda dentro de um vagão de trem indo para o que seria um campo de concentração
O jogo inteiro fosse se sente oprimido ,mas não pelos alienígenas diretamente como foi no half-life 1,  mas sim pela ordem de humanos que domína o mundo.
Quando você acha que o mundo está perdido eis que personagem dá uma virada, e passa a ter o controle de um "exercito bem diferente e inusitado".
Seria gratificante e libertador se consegui-se apenas derrotar o líder ditador dos humanos apenas,só que ...
Eis que ditador humano aparece falando com um ser misterioso (não reconhecido ainda).
E no final reaparece o homem misterioso que faz terminar o jogo no momento mais dramático. 
Fique calmo que a expansão continua desse ponto explicando o que acontceu com o protagonista Gordon e a Alyx Vance.

Mas fica cada mais curioso em descobrir quem é o homem misterioso , será ele um humano ? um alienígena ? ou algo ainda maior ?! (se é que pode exisir)
Porque humano ele não parece ser... Cada vez mais tenho medo da resposta (talvez agora tenho mais medo que o rosto dele)
Que venha o Half-Life 3 ...
One of the best games ever, just enjoy it!
